member.name: T:Zodiac.ZodiacCalculator
member.summary: This class will return the zodiac sign based on the day and month of birth, both in English and Vietnamese

member.name: M:Zodiac.ZodiacCalculator.GetZodiacEnglish(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method will return the zodiac sign in English based on day and month of birth

member.name: M:Zodiac.ZodiacCalculator.GetZodiacVietnamese(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts/translates English zodiac sign to Vietnamese zodiac sign
